ComicInfo.Summary:
Something stinks! And it's not MAD #34, which makes pure parody out of pollution! This issue features a wide variety of classic MAD movie and TV parodies, plus classic favorites like "Spy vs. Spy," "A MAD Look at..." by Sergio Aragones, "The Lighter Side of..." by Dave Berg, and much more from the Usual Gang of Idiots, including a new Fold-In by the environmentally conscious Johnny Sampson.
Clean up your act with a shot of humor in a jugular vein.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-18 22:42:12. [Issue ID 1031114]
